cards.name: The Fool
cards.description: In spiritual matters, represents ideas and thoughts, which endeavor to transcend earth. In material matters, reveals folly, eccentricity, even mania. It represents a sudden, unexpected impulse.

cards.name: The Magus
cards.description: Skill. Wisdom. Adroitness. Elasticity. Craft, Cunning. Deceit. Theft. Sometimes esoteric wisdom or power. Messages. Business Transactions. Learning or intelligence interfering with the matter in hand.

cards.name: The Moon
cards.description: Illusion. Deception. Bewilderment. Falsehood. Voluntary change. Influenced: Hysteria. Madness.
